thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by John H.

author: John H.
title: John H.
text:
Walked into the store and was only looking to furnish a bedroom . Our salesperson asked if we needed help . We said we were only looking . Later we decided to purchase a complete household package they advertise for $1999. Our salesperson followed us and answered our questions. We opted for layaway which is not advertised . Just the financing options are advertised . Found the furniture package . Made some substitution . Salesperson made our purchase painless and wonderful. I would recommend others to my salesperson and
Home Zone Furniture.
